pull.title: bench: Destroy wallet txs instead of leaking their memory
pull.body: This should destroy the wallet txs when the benchmark ends to avoid having to hold them when the following benchmarks run.

events.message: bench: Destroy wallet txs instead of leaking their memory

events.body:
Concept ACK

Thanks for doing this. Nice to get rid of the need for suppressions for this leak in LSAN, Valgrind, etc.
